name: BouBouBounce
description:
BouBouBounce is a game produced during a gamejam on the theme "Bounce". It is an arcade game where the player is a gang member who is chased by the police and tries to join his group to find a safe place.

To move forward he has to send balls on switches to open blocked paths using the walls to bounce the ball and access inaccessible places

If you want see more of my projects : https://loriusd5.wixsite.com/lorielparis
